item.title: Bangalore to Alleppey Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Alleppey (Alappuzha) can be a memorable experience, as you'll get to explore the backwaters, houseboat cruises, and serene beauty of the famous backwater destination in Kerala. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Coimbatore -> Kochi -> Alleppey Bangalore -> Maddur -> Chamarajanagar -> Coimbatore -&
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Kochi Solo Trip plan
item.description: Two to Three days trip from Bangalore to Kochi, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in a Car, then this two to three days plan works very well to cover Kochi and one couple more quick visits in Mysore, Ooty and Coimbatore on the way. Kochi, called as Queen of the Arabian Sea, is one of the major port cities in the coast of India and also has
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
